testcase.classname: Add EGift card to the Cart
testcase.name: Search and Add E-Gift Card with amount:100 to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigates to "Amazon" application................................passed And User verifies page title contains "Amazon.com"..........................passed When User enters search request "electronic gift card" in the Search Bar....passed And User verifies page title contains "Electronic Gift Card"................passed Then User select and click on "Starbucks Gift Cards - Email Delivery" item..passed And User verifies page title contains "Starbucks"...........................passed Then User selects "Fall Thank You" card design..............................passed Then User select amount:"100", enters To:"fuad@gmail.com", From:"Fuad", Message:"HB!", Quantity:"1" on the Gift Card Details.passed And User select month:"October", date:"31", year:"2022" on the Gift Card Details.passed And User Validates Quantity:"1" and Cart Subtotal value:"$100.00"...........passed And User click Add to card button...........................................passed
